caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of child grooming.
summary: This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include child grooming as a reportable offense requiring sex offender registration. The bill does not specifically target Chinese immigrants or any particular ethnic group, but applies to all individuals convicted of child grooming offenses regardless of nationality.
translation: 该法案修改《刑事诉讼法》，将儿童诱骗行为列入需要进行性犯罪者登记的应报告犯罪行为。该法案并不特别针对中国移民或任何特定族裔群体，而是适用于所有被判犯有儿童诱骗罪的个人，不论其国籍。
committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. Judiciary Committee
3. Public Safety Committee
